article_title: Christensen: The many faces of Pat McCrory
article_text:
Pat McCrory has run as a moderate, conservative, and a pragmatist

Annoucing his re-election last week, McCrory seems on two-tiered track

McCrory stresses both economic development, while plugging social issues

article_metadata.news-keywords: Pat McCrory, North Carolina, Charlotte, Jack Hawke, Roy Cooper, Bev Perdue, Republican Party, pat mccrory governor, walter dalton
article_metadata.description: What makes Gov. Pat McCrory’s election campaigns so intriguing is you are never sure which McCrory will show up.
article_metadata.title: Christensen: The many faces of Pat McCrory | News & Observer
